mapper.select: SELECT revision_no, prj_no, rev_comment, sys_reg_date FROM PRJ_REVISION_BASE WHERE prj_no = #{prj_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRJ_REVISION_BASE(revision_no, prj_no, rev_comment, sys_reg_date) VALUES (REVISION_SEQ.nextval, #{prj_no}, #{rev_comment}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE PRJ_REVISION_BASE SET revision_no = #{revision_no}, prj_no = #{prj_no}, rev_comment = #{rev_comment} WHERE revision_no = #{revision_no}
